title: Music Recommendations Please
body: Updating my playlist for League of Legends. All song recommendations are welcome. Links would be nice as well.

replies.body: Look up xKito on youtube, all of her music is pretty good listening for League!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hRVloMch-wM

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xcQxMvRFNyk
Also from the same artist, "The Way" and "Vengeance".

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7pU4RA8L_V4
By the same group I also recommend "Passive", "Counting bodies like sheep to the rhythm of the war drums" and "The Package".

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FuvWc3ToDHg

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=el5hjlV2gxI

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QNzIKoAy2pk
